title: Portobello mushrooms with Heinz® Beanz and grilled halloumi cheese
ingredients: ['4 large portobello mushrooms', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '4 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 pinch pepper', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (415g) tin Heinz® beans', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '8 thin slices halloumi cheese', '75g rocket leaves', '1 pear, cored and sliced', '25g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
